rows.label: qev018501_MSG0001
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0002
rows.name:
...Hmm? Oh, it's you. *siiigh*
Er, sorry. Am I being obvious?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0003
rows.name:
So I told you Kirsty pulled strings so I could present my
work to some industry heads, right? And it went well!
Or I thought so, anyway...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0004
rows.name:
But I've heard nothing since that day. Nothing!
My research is at a total standstill.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_JNK0010
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: qev018501_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Hugo not to give up.

rows.label: qev018501_JNK0020
rows.name: Discourage

rows.label: qev018501_SEL0021
rows.name: Make Hugo face the truth that no one cares.

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0005
rows.name:
No, you're right. I know my battle probes are going to
spark a revolution. I just have to keep reminding myself
of that truth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0006
rows.name:
Thanks. I feel a little better. It seems I owe you for
more than just a mountain of miranium![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0007
rows.name: What? No, that's... No![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0008
rows.name:
My battle probes are revolutionary! They're going to
play a big part in the future of the BLADEs![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0009
rows.name:
I've been working on a new series of battle probes that
helps fighters defend against attribute damage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0010
rows.name:
It's the last of the designs I made aboard the White
Whale. If this one doesn't convince my detractors,
I'll admit defeat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0011
rows.name:
Could I ask your help one last time?
It's a big favorâ€”I need 40,000 units of miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0012
rows.name:
You understand, right? I mean, you've used my battle
probes more than anyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0013
rows.name:
These things make a difference! They could keep our
people alive in the field![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0014
rows.name:
And in the right circumstances, they'll make more of a
difference than any Skell or weapon could.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0015
rows.name: So I'll be waiting here for that miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0016
rows.name:
I'll produce a new type of battle probe that the arms
industry brass CAN'T ignore![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0017
rows.name:
Kirsty gave me this chance, and I won't let her efforts
go to waste.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0018
rows.name:
Once the first one of my attribute resistance probes
is complete, I'm showing it to those arms industry
bigwigs even if I have to storm their offices.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0019
rows.name:
I'll make them see that my inventions are the final piece
of New LA's defenses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0020
rows.name: So please get that miranium to me as soon as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0021
rows.name:
I'm 110 percent ready to go!
Have you secured the miranium yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_JNK0030
rows.name: Deliver

rows.label: qev018501_SEL0031
rows.name: Hand over 40,000 units of miranium.

rows.label: qev018501_JNK0040
rows.name: Keep

rows.label: qev018501_SEL0041
rows.name: Hold on to your miranium for now.

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0022
rows.name: All right. It's time to realize my finest design...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0023
rows.name:
The attribute resistance probe! It's like nothing
even I've made before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0024
rows.name: So let your hopes get sky-high![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0025
rows.name:
Er, but now that you're here, would you listen
to a quick story?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0026
rows.name:
So just as I finished working on this, I was contacted
by a big-wig from one of the arms manufacturers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0027
rows.name: Turns out they want me to head up their new project![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0028
rows.name:
It's a pretty massive undertaking from the sound of it,
which is probably why it took so long for them to get
back to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0029
rows.name:
But they finally saw the value of my battle probes...
All my work. It's... This isn't a dream, is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_JNK0050
rows.name: Congratulate

rows.label: qev018501_SEL0051
rows.name: Grin and shake Hugo's hand.

rows.label: qev018501_JNK0060
rows.name: Deride

rows.label: qev018501_SEL0061
rows.name: Mock Hugo for selling out to the man.

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0030
rows.name: None of it could have happened without you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0031
rows.name: Thank you. I promise I'll never forget this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0032
rows.name:
Aw, are you worried about me?
Thanks, but I should be fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0033
rows.name:
They say I have complete creative control of the project.
It's my show to run, no matter what.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0034
rows.name:
I figure this might be the last time I get to hand you
one of my battle probes in person...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0035
rows.name: Here. It's my gift to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0036
rows.name:
It's my greatest masterpiece...the attribute
resistance probe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0037
rows.name:
Install one in a FrontierNav probe site, and it'll
boost all of your attribute resistances as long as
you're fighting in that region.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0038
rows.name:
Use it to keep the city safe. And in the meantime,
I'll dedicate the rest of my career to fortifying New LA
as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0039
rows.name:
After all, this city is the final bastion of mankind here
on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0045
rows.name:
What, are you holding out for a marriage proposal?
Because if that's what it takes to get that miranium,
I've got a ring around here somewhere...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018501_MSG0046
rows.name:
Please hurry, all right? I'm dying to get to work
building my attribute defense probe. C'mon...[ST:wait ]
